item.description: Get tickets ahead of time here: http://www.fandango.com/02122_movietheatershowtimes?date=2/22/2008 Runtime: 2hrs 19min. | Rated R for disturbing and graphic depiction of violent anti-social behavior, sexuality and language. anti-social? lol. ah the review boards had a field day with this movie =P. Director: David Fincher (the director of alien3, se7en, the game, panic room, zodiac, and the upcoming The Curious Case of Benjamin Button) Screenwriter: Chuck Palahniuk (novel), Jim Uhls (screenplay) Starring: Edward Norton, Brad Pitt, Helena Bonham Carter, Meat Loaf (yes) Genre: Action, Drama, Thriller Reviews: http://www.google.com/search?q=fight+club+review&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a Trailer: Description: The mundane existence of a product liability evaluator and insomniac, who is addicted to self-help groups, is turned upside down when he meets a sado-masochistic anarchist who is secretly plotting to overthrow civilization. http://www.boston.com/movies/display?display=movie&id=1663 The film is about so much more, the less you know the better. The reason I like it is because Fight Club defines an entire generation (the X'ers) to some degree. Although I am not a part of that generation, I understand the part about the spiritual depression. It's a poignant and moving statement for the current state of affairs for the young people in any generation. Notes: Please do not RSVP YES if you do not intend to come. Yes is not a MAYBE. If you can't figure out what you are going to do in the future, please do not burden us with that. Please buy your tix AHEAD of time! I'm going to watch this regardless of people coming, but it will more fun with people. How to find me: I"ll be wearing my trademark green hat+Meetup logo+my screename JediFonger in front as usual @the TOP of the stairs AFTER you buy your ticket! Remember, buy your tickets ahead of time! Please be ON TIME! Try to be there @11PM. there will be LOT of people and it will be packed! I will be there with friends probably before 11:30PM sometime. I intend to go into the auditorium by 11:45PM SHARP with spaces reserved. So the earlier you come, the more likely you can get a good seat. If you don't show up, I won't be reserving a seat for you. The film begins @midnight.
item.how_to_find_us: I"ll be wearing my trademark green hat+Meetup logo+my screename JediFonger in front as usual @the TOP of the stairs AFTER you buy your ticket! Remember, buy your tickets ahead of time! Please be ON TIME!
item.why: the 1st rule of fight club is you do not talk about fight club. the second rule is, you do not talk about fight club. if this is your first night@fight club... YOU HAVE TO FIGHT!
item.name: Fight Club! Special Screening!
